hymn.title: Pray to labor with the Lord (Alternate Tune)

layout.singingstanza: Pray to la -- bor with the Lord, Pray to pave the way for Him; Pray to move Him and be moved From the cen -- ter to the rim.

lyrics.stanza: Pray to labor with the Lord, Pray to pave the way for Him; Pray to move Him and be moved From the center to the rim.
Pray to labor with the Lord, Be identified with Him In His purpose and His aim Till His blessing floodeth in.
Pray to labor with the Lord; Self-ambition and self-will We must ever cast away, All His purpose to fulfill.
Pray to labor with the Lord Till the wheel begins to move; Pray together with the Lord Till the Church His pow'r shall prove.
